Principal Investigator Dr. Ruiqi Han (éŸ©ç‘ç¦) Principal Investigator
Dr. Han received his Ph.D. in Biochemistry and Molecular Biology from Nanjing University. His research focuses on 3D genome organization and its role in gene regulation and cell function. He has published numerous papers in top journals including Nature, Cell, and Science. Email: r.han@nju.edu.cn
Office: Room 302, Institute of â€¦
